#include <iostream>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;


uint64_t mul_mod(uint64_t a, uint64_t b, uint64_t m)
{
   long double x;
   uint64_t c;
   int64_t r;
   if (a >= m) a %= m;
   if (b >= m) b %= m;
   x = a;
   c = x * b / m;
   r = (int64_t)(a * b - c * m) % (int64_t)m;
   return r < 0 ? r + m : r;
}

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t ; cin >> t ;
	while(t -- ){
		long long int n , b ;
		cin >> n >> b ; 
		unsigned long long int res , rem ;
		res = 1 ;
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) res = mul_mod(res,i,b) ;
		if(n > 1){
			if(res % 2) puts("Odd") ;
			else {
				if(b % 2) puts("Even") ;
				else{
					rem = 1 ;
					for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) rem = mul_mod(rem,i,2*b) ;
					if(rem < res) rem += 2 * b ;
					rem -= res ;
					puts( rem ? "Odd" : "Even" ) ;
				}
			}
		}else{
			n = 1 ; 
			puts( (n/b) ? "Odd" : "Even" ) ;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
